content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max Müller, the rental price of this apartment is non-negotiable. I want to get the highest price possible. If you are interested, you have to accept my price. Let's start negotiating.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but I can't accept your price. I'm looking for the lowest price possible. If you're willing to consider a lower price, I'm open to discussing it.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because you are looking for the lowest price possible and I want to get the highest price possible. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
